See you later, thanks for visiting
Dalton is 27 years old. Born in 1994.
Dalton is currently a Systems Engineer as Omega Systems. Previous he worked at Fox Group Inc. as a Data Processor and a Web Developer. Before that he was an Assistant Manager at AMC.
Dalton is currently attending University of Maryland for his bachelor's degree in Computer Science. He previously gradated from Reading Area Community College with an associte's degree.
Dalton likes to build projects on his free time. He also enjoys 3d printing. On the weekends he spends time with his dogs and his friends playing DND.
Dalton currently is located in Macungie, PA. He is willing to relocate or commute.
